item.description: A little short notice for a little get together. Just went back to work after a recent surgery and thought it would be fun to do a happy hour. Johnny Rae's offers during Friday night happy hour a free buffett which is usually wings and maybe pasta or pizza. There will some special on drinks during that time as well. So take a break from cooking and spend time with some friendly people.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Party Express goes to an Hour of Happy Hour at Johnny Rae's Restaurant
